nodes.bodyText: Can we move those into consts?

This is not needed and will be deleted after next transifex sync.
Translations (to other languages) need to be done on transifex.com

nodes.bodyText:
Why is this removed?
If it is a valid point, please still have it in a separate PR, otherwise revert please.

Because it's useless.
But okay, we can go back with warnings...

Just a minor nitpick:

m is a legacy way of showing a member variable of a class (which is accessible in whole class)
we try to get rid of the m prefix, as it is shown by AndroidStudio

You can also combine it to SortingOredDialogFragment.newInstance(…).show(…).
(with a wrap after .newInstance(…) for readability
